data.content:
Jhin (Empyrean Jhin)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: March 22, 2018

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous and artistic approach to combat, Jhin is a marksman who thrives on precision and elegance. With his Empyrean Jhin skin, he takes his artistry to new heights, embodying the celestial beauty and power of the heavens.

Empyrean Jhin is a visually stunning skin that transforms Jhin into a celestial being. His armor is adorned with intricate golden patterns, reminiscent of constellations, and his cloak billows with ethereal energy. The skin features vibrant blue and gold hues, giving Jhin an otherworldly appearance that perfectly complements his meticulous nature.

The Empyrean Jhin skin also includes new visual effects that enhance his abilities. His basic attacks are accompanied by shimmering stardust, leaving a trail of celestial beauty in their wake. His abilities, such as Dancing Grenade, Deadly Flourish, and Curtain Call, are all enhanced with stunning celestial effects, making each shot feel like a work of art.

In addition to the visual upgrades, Empyrean Jhin also features new sound effects. The sound of his gunshots is transformed into a melodic symphony, adding an extra layer of elegance to his attacks. The voiceover for Jhin is also modified, with new lines that reflect his celestial transformation, further immersing players into the skin's theme.

Now, let's delve into the story of Jhin himself. Jhin, originally named Khada Jhin, was once a renowned Ionian artist. However, his artistic talents took a dark turn when he became obsessed with perfection and the beauty of death. He began using his artistic skills to create elaborate and gruesome murders, turning his victims into macabre works of art.

Jhin's reign of terror caught the attention of Shen, the Eye of Twilight, and Zed, the Master of Shadows. They formed a group known as the Kinkou Order, with the sole purpose of stopping Jhin's killing spree. After a long and intense battle, Jhin was finally captured and imprisoned. But his story did not end there.

Years later, Jhin was freed by a mysterious benefactor who saw potential in his unique talents. He was given a new purpose and a new identity as Jhin, the Virtuoso. Now, he uses his artistic skills to create chaos and fear on the battlefield, leaving a trail of death and destruction in his wake.

In the game, Jhin is a high-damage marksman who excels at long-range engagements. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage every fourth shot, making each shot feel impactful. His Q ability, Dancing Grenade, bounces between enemies, dealing damage with each hit. His W ability, Deadly Flourish, roots enemies in place, setting them up for a devastating attack. His E ability, Captive Audience, places traps that slow and damage enemies who trigger them. Finally, his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allows him to fire four powerful shots from a long range, dealing massive damage to his targets.

Jhin's strengths lie in his ability to deal massive burst damage from a safe distance. His long-range attacks and crowd control abilities make him a formidable force in team fights. However, he is also quite fragile and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions who can close the gap quickly.

In conclusion, Empyrean Jhin is a visually stunning skin that transforms Jhin into a celestial being. With its intricate design, vibrant colors, and enhanced visual and sound effects, the skin truly captures the essence of Jhin's meticulous and artistic nature. Whether you're a fan of Jhin or simply appreciate the beauty of his artistry, Empyrean Jhin is a skin that is sure to impress.

For more information about Jhin and his various appearances, as well as gameplay videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Jhin on the League of Legends website.

Jhin (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous and artistic approach to combat, Jhin is a marksman who thrives on precision and elegance. His default skin, simply named

embodies his character and showcases his unique style. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Jhin's default costume and explore all the intricate details of this iconic skin.

The Story of Jhin's Default Costume

Jhin's default skin represents his true essence as the meticulous and methodical killer that he is. The costume features a sleek black suit adorned with golden accents, reflecting his obsession with perfection and beauty. The mask he wears adds an air of mystery and intrigue, concealing his face and amplifying the enigma surrounding his true identity. The intricate patterns on his clothing and the meticulous attention to detail in every aspect of his design highlight his artistic nature and his obsession with turning death into a masterpiece.

The color scheme of Jhin's default skin is predominantly black and gold, symbolizing his pursuit of perfection and his desire to create art through his kills. The gold accents on his suit and mask add a touch of elegance and sophistication, further emphasizing his status as a virtuoso in the art of killing. The overall design of the default skin perfectly captures Jhin's character, making it a favorite among players and fans of the game.

Jhin's Story and Role in League of Legends

Jhin's story in League of Legends is as captivating as his appearance. Born in Ionia, Jhin was once a simple artist who found solace in his craft. However, his obsession with perfection led him down a dark path, and he became a notorious serial killer known as Khada Jhin. His killings were not mere acts of violence; they were meticulously planned and executed with an artistic flair that left the authorities baffled.

Jhin's unique abilities and playstyle in the game reflect his character's story. He is a marksman who relies on precision and timing to deal devastating damage to his enemies. His passive ability,
allows him to deal bonus damage every fourth shot, representing his meticulous approach to combat. His ultimate ability,

allows him to unleash a barrage of deadly shots from a long range, further emphasizing his role as a long-range sniper.

In the game, Jhin's strengths lie in his ability to deal massive damage from a safe distance. His long-range attacks and high burst damage make him a formidable threat to squishy targets. Additionally, his traps and crowd control abilities provide him with excellent zoning and control over the battlefield. However, Jhin's weaknesses lie in his immobility and vulnerability to crowd control effects. He relies heavily on positioning and careful planning to maximize his damage output, making him susceptible to coordinated attacks and dives from enemy champions.

Jhin's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward champion. Skilled players who can master his unique playstyle and capitalize on his strengths can dominate the game and turn team fights in their favor. However, inexperienced players may find it challenging to navigate his immobility and execute his abilities effectively. Jhin requires precision, patience, and a keen eye for opportunities to truly shine on the battlefield.

Explore Jhin's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Jhin and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. From his default skin to his numerous alternate skins, each with its own unique theme and design, Jhin offers players a wide range of options to express their personal style and preferences. Whether you prefer the elegance of his default skin or the thematic flair of his alternate costumes, Jhin's appearances are sure to captivate and inspire players.

Jhin (Soul Fighter Jhin)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: August 10, 2021

Soul Fighter Jhin is a captivating skin that brings a whole new level of elegance and mystique to the virtuoso marksman. Released on August 10, 2021, this skin is a part of the Soul Fighter skin line, which features champions infused with the power of souls. With its intricate design and unique visual effects, Soul Fighter Jhin is a must-have for any Jhin enthusiast.

The Story of Soul Fighter Jhin

In the world of League of Legends, Jhin is known for his obsession with perfection and his artistic approach to killing. He sees himself as a virtuoso, a master of his craft, and his performances are nothing short of breathtaking. With the Soul Fighter Jhin skin, his artistry takes on a whole new dimension.

Soul Fighter Jhin is a manifestation of Jhin's connection to the souls of his victims. As he takes their lives, he absorbs their essence, channeling their energy into his own power. This skin showcases Jhin's ability to harness the souls he has collected, transforming him into a formidable force on the battlefield.

The design of Soul Fighter Jhin is a perfect blend of elegance and darkness. His outfit is adorned with intricate patterns and flowing fabrics, giving him an ethereal appearance. The color palette consists of deep purples and blues, symbolizing the connection to the souls he has captured. The skin also features unique visual effects, such as glowing soul orbs that swirl around Jhin as he moves, adding an extra layer of mystique to his presence.

One of the standout features of Soul Fighter Jhin is his weapon, a mystical staff infused with the power of souls. The staff is adorned with intricate engravings and emits a faint glow, representing the energy it harnesses. With each shot fired, the staff releases a burst of soul energy, leaving a trail of ethereal particles in its wake. This visual effect adds a sense of otherworldly power to Jhin's attacks, making them even more awe-inspiring.

Jhin: The Virtuoso

Jhin, also known as Khada Jhin, is a champion in the game League of Legends. He was released on February 1, 2016, and quickly became a fan favorite due to his unique playstyle and captivating lore. Jhin is an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) champion, specializing in dealing massive amounts of damage from a distance.

Jhin's past is shrouded in mystery and darkness. He was once a renowned Ionian artist, known for his exceptional skills in painting and performance. However, his obsession with perfection led him down a dark path. Jhin became a serial killer, using his artistic talents to turn his murders into macabre works of art. He sees each kill as a performance, meticulously planning every detail to create the perfect masterpiece.

In the game, Jhin's playstyle reflects his artistic nature. His abilities revolve around precision and timing, rewarding players who can land skillshots and carefully plan their attacks. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage on every fourth shot, making each attack feel impactful and deadly. Jhin's ultimate ability, Curtain Call, is a long-range snipe that can decimate enemy teams if used correctly.

Jhin's strengths lie in his ability to deal massive amounts of damage from a safe distance. With his long-range attacks and high burst damage, he can quickly eliminate squishy targets and turn team fights in his team's favor. His traps, known as Captive Audience, provide vision and crowd control, making it difficult for enemies to engage on him. Jhin's weaknesses, however, lie in his immobility and vulnerability to crowd control. He relies on positioning and careful planning to stay safe in team fights.

In the world of League of Legends, Jhin has become an iconic champion, known for his unique playstyle and captivating lore. His obsession with perfection and his artistic approach to killing make him a truly memorable character. With the Soul Fighter Jhin skin, players can experience a whole new level of elegance and mystique, immersing themselves in the world of Jhin's artistry.

For more information about Jhin and to see all of his appearances in the game, including the stunning Soul Fighter Jhin skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the virtuoso marksman. Watch videos, explore his abilities, and discover the true artistry of Jhin in League of Legends.

Jhin: The Virtuoso

Release Date: February 1, 2016

Within the vast and diverse world of League of Legends, there are champions that captivate players with their unique abilities, intriguing stories, and distinctive playstyles. One such champion is Jhin, also known as

Released on February 1, 2016, Jhin quickly became a fan favorite due to his enigmatic personality, meticulous nature, and unparalleled skill with a firearm.

The Story of Jhin

Jhin's story is shrouded in mystery and darkness, making him one of the most intriguing characters in the League of Legends universe. Born in Ionia, a land known for its harmony and balance, Jhin's early life was marked by tragedy. He witnessed the brutal murder of his parents at a young age, an event that would forever shape his twisted perception of beauty and art.

Driven by a desire for revenge, Jhin dedicated his life to becoming a master assassin. He honed his skills with meticulous precision, turning killing into an art form. Jhin's obsession with perfection led him to adopt a unique philosophy:

As Jhin's reputation grew, so did the legends surrounding him. His victims were not merely killed; they were transformed into macabre works of art. Each murder was meticulously planned and executed, leaving a trail of terror in his wake. Jhin's signature calling card, a lotus blossom, became a symbol of fear and dread.

Eventually, Jhin's path crossed with the League of Legends, an organization that sought to bring order to the chaos of Valoran. Recognizing his exceptional skills, the League recruited Jhin as a champion, harnessing his deadly talents for their own purposes. Now, Jhin fights on the Fields of Justice, using his artistry and precision to eliminate his opponents with chilling efficiency.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Jhin's unique playstyle sets him apart from other champions in League of Legends. He is a marksman who relies on his long-range abilities and impeccable aim to deal devastating damage to his enemies. Here are some of Jhin's strengths and weaknesses:

Strengths:

  • Long-range damage: Jhin's basic attacks and abilities have an impressive range, allowing him to safely poke and harass enemies from a distance.
  • High burst damage: Jhin's fourth shot, known as

deals massive damage to a single target, making him a formidable threat in team fights.
  • Crowd control: Jhin's abilities, such as
and

provide crowd control effects that can immobilize and disrupt enemies, giving his team an advantage in fights.
  • Artistic execution: Jhin's unique playstyle and meticulous nature make him a satisfying champion to master. Landing a perfectly timed shot or executing a well-planned trap is immensely rewarding.

    • Weaknesses:

    • Low mobility: Jhin lacks mobility compared to other marksmen, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or gap-closing abilities.
    • Reloading mechanic: Jhin's basic attacks are limited to four shots before he needs to reload, leaving him temporarily vulnerable during this process.
    • Dependent on positioning: Jhin's effectiveness heavily relies on his positioning. If caught out of position, he becomes an easy target for assassins or champions with high burst damage.
    • Weak against tanks: Jhin's damage output is less effective against tanky champions due to their high health and resistances.

    Jhin's Place in the Game

    Jhin's unique playstyle and captivating lore have made him a popular pick among League of Legends players. His meticulous nature and obsession with perfection resonate with those who appreciate the artistry of the game. Jhin's long-range damage and crowd control abilities make him a valuable asset in team fights, allowing him to pick off enemies from a safe distance and control the battlefield.

    Furthermore, Jhin's presence in the game extends beyond his gameplay. His dark and mysterious persona has inspired numerous skins, each with its own thematic twist. From the haunting
to the elegant

players can explore the various facets of Jhin's character through these visually stunning skins.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, players can access detailed information and videos showcasing all of Jhin's skins. This allows players to immerse themselves in Jhin's world and appreciate the intricate design and artistry behind each skin.

In conclusion, Jhin, the Virtuoso, stands as a testament to the creativity and depth of the League of Legends universe. With his haunting backstory, unique playstyle, and captivating presence, Jhin has become an iconic champion within the game. Whether players are drawn to his meticulous nature or his deadly precision, Jhin offers a truly unforgettable experience on the Fields of Justice.

Jhin (SKT T1 Jhin)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 19, 2017

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous attention to detail and his obsession with perfection, Jhin is a marksman who excels at long-range precision and devastatingly accurate shots. His unique playstyle and captivating personality have made him a fan favorite among players. One of the many skins available for Jhin is the

skin, which pays homage to the legendary Korean esports team SK Telecom T1.

The

skin was released on April 19, 2017, and can be purchased for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Jhin into a member of the SK Telecom T1 team, complete with their iconic black and red color scheme. The skin features new visual effects, animations, and sound effects that perfectly capture the essence of the team and its legacy. With this skin, Jhin becomes a true embodiment of the SK Telecom T1 spirit, showcasing his deadly precision and unwavering determination.

The

skin is a testament to the success and dominance of SK Telecom T1 in the world of League of Legends esports. The team has achieved unparalleled success, winning multiple World Championships and establishing themselves as one of the greatest teams in the history of the game. This skin allows players to pay tribute to the team and show their support for their favorite players while playing as Jhin.

In terms of appearance, the

skin features Jhin wearing the team's jersey, adorned with the SK Telecom T1 logo. His mask is redesigned to incorporate the team's colors, and his weapon, Whisper, is transformed into a sleek and stylish sniper rifle. The skin also includes new recall animations, where Jhin showcases his skills with a flourish, reminiscent of the team's iconic victory poses.

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a complex and intriguing character in the world of League of Legends. His story is shrouded in mystery, and his past is filled with darkness and tragedy. Jhin was once a renowned Ionian artist, known for his breathtaking works of art. However, his obsession with perfection led him down a dark path, and he became a merciless killer, using his artistic talents to create elaborate and gruesome murders.

Jhin's unique playstyle revolves around his passive ability, Whisper, which allows him to deal bonus damage on every fourth shot. This ability, combined with his long-range abilities and crowd control, makes him a formidable force on the battlefield. Jhin's ultimate ability, Curtain Call, is particularly devastating, allowing him to fire four shots at extreme range, dealing massive damage to his enemies.

Despite his strengths, Jhin also has weaknesses. He is incredibly immobile and vulnerable to crowd control, making him an easy target for assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, his reliance on landing skill shots means that he requires precise positioning and timing to maximize his damage output. However, in the hands of a skilled player, Jhin can be a terrifying force to be reckoned with.

Jhin's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward marksman. His unique playstyle and meticulous attention to detail make him a challenging champion to master. However, his ability to deal massive damage from a safe distance and his ability to control team fights make him a valuable asset to any team. Jhin's presence on the battlefield is always felt, as his shots echo with deadly precision and his artistic flair captivates both allies and enemies alike.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Jhin, including the

skin. Whether you're a fan of Jhin's meticulous playstyle or a supporter of the legendary SK Telecom T1 team, this skin is a must-have for any Jhin enthusiast. Embrace the spirit of perfection and dominate the battlefield with the
skin.

Jhin (Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2020

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is known for his meticulous attention to detail and his obsession with perfection. His Dark Cosmic Erasure skin takes his obsession to a whole new level, transforming him into a cosmic entity of destruction and chaos. This skin is a part of the Dark Cosmic skin line, which features champions corrupted by the dark forces of the universe. With its stunning visual effects and thematic design, Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin is a must-have for any Jhin enthusiast.

The Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin skin is priced at 1820 RP, making it a legendary skin. It was released on April 30, 2020, and has since become one of the most sought-after skins in the game. The skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Jhin, including new animations, sound effects, and voice lines, all designed to immerse players in the cosmic horror that Jhin has become.

Details of the Costume

Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin features a dark and twisted interpretation of Jhin's original design. His once elegant and refined appearance has been corrupted by the cosmic forces, turning him into a terrifying and otherworldly being. The skin showcases Jhin's obsession with perfection, as every detail of his new form is meticulously crafted to evoke a sense of awe and fear.

The most striking aspect of the Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin skin is his new color palette. Jhin's once vibrant colors have been replaced with deep shades of purple and black, giving him an ominous and sinister presence. His clothing is adorned with cosmic symbols and patterns, further emphasizing his connection to the dark forces of the universe.

The visual effects of the skin are truly mesmerizing. Jhin's abilities now leave behind trails of cosmic energy, creating a sense of otherworldly power. His ultimate ability, Curtain Call, is particularly impressive, as it summons dark cosmic energy to rain down upon his enemies. The sound effects have also been revamped to match the cosmic theme, with eerie echoes and distorted voices accompanying Jhin's every move.

In addition to the visual and sound effects, Dark Cosmic Erasure Jhin also features new voice lines. Jhin's voice has taken on a more sinister tone, reflecting his descent into darkness. His quotes are filled with references to cosmic entities and the destruction they bring, further enhancing the skin's thematic coherence.

Jhin's Story

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He is a meticulous and methodical marksman who sees killing as an art form. Jhin's obsession with perfection and his twisted sense of aesthetics make him a unique and captivating character in the game.

Jhin's past is shrouded in mystery. He was once a renowned Ionian artist, celebrated for his mastery of the brush. However, his artistic talents took a dark turn when he became obsessed with capturing the beauty of death. Jhin's paintings became increasingly macabre, depicting scenes of violence and suffering. His descent into madness eventually led him to become a hired assassin, using his skills to create

through murder.

In the game, Jhin is a high-damage marksman who excels at picking off enemies from a distance. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage every fourth shot, making each shot a deadly precision strike. Jhin's abilities revolve around his meticulous planning and execution, with his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allowing him to snipe enemies from afar with devastating precision.

Jhin's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward champion. His damage output is immense, but he is also incredibly fragile. Jhin players must carefully position themselves and time their abilities to maximize their impact while avoiding enemy threats. His unique playstyle and captivating lore have made him a favorite among players who enjoy the challenge of mastering a complex and intriguing champion.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Jhin's appearances in the game, including his base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you're a fan of his Dark Cosmic Erasure skin or simply interested in learning more about this enigmatic champion, this page is your go-to resource for all things Jhin.

Jhin (High Noon Jhin)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 10, 2016

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous and artistic approach to combat, Jhin is a marksman who takes pleasure in the beauty of death. His unique playstyle and captivating design have made him a favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is the

skin, which adds a western twist to his already intriguing character.

The

skin was released on August 10, 2016, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Jhin into a gunslinger from the wild west, complete with a cowboy hat, leather duster, and a revolver that looks like it came straight out of a spaghetti western. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with every aspect of Jhin's appearance reflecting the theme of the wild west.

The

skin not only changes Jhin's appearance but also adds new visual and sound effects to his abilities. His Q ability, Dancing Grenade, now features a western-themed explosion, complete with a burst of flames and a satisfying gunshot sound. His W ability, Deadly Flourish, showcases a lasso animation when it roots an enemy, further enhancing the cowboy aesthetic. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, features a unique sound effect that resembles the sound of a distant gunshot echoing through the desert.

In addition to the visual and sound effects, the

skin also includes new recall and death animations. During the recall animation, Jhin spins his revolver on his finger before holstering it, showcasing his skill and confidence as a gunslinger. The death animation is equally impressive, as Jhin dramatically falls to the ground, leaving behind a trail of smoke and a single rose, symbolizing the beauty he finds in death.

Now, let's delve into the story of Jhin and his place in the League of Legends universe. Jhin, originally named Khada Jhin, was once a renowned Ionian artist known for his mastery of the brush. However, his artistic talents took a dark turn when he became obsessed with perfection and the beauty of death. Jhin's artistry transformed into a macabre form of expression, as he began using his skills to create elaborate and gruesome murders.

Jhin's reign of terror caught the attention of Shen, the Eye of Twilight, who sought to put an end to his killing spree. Shen, along with his allies, captured Jhin and imprisoned him. However, Jhin's story did not end there. He was eventually freed by a mysterious benefactor who saw potential in his unique talents. This benefactor, known as Khada Jhin's

provided him with the means to continue his artistic pursuits, but under a new name and purpose.

Now known simply as Jhin, he became a hired assassin, using his artistic flair to carry out his deadly missions. Jhin's meticulous nature and obsession with perfection make him a formidable opponent on the battlefield. His abilities revolve around precision and timing, allowing him to deal devastating damage from a distance. His passive ability, Whisper, grants him bonus damage on every fourth shot, making each shot a carefully calculated masterpiece.

Despite his strengths, Jhin does have weaknesses. He is incredibly immobile, lacking any dashes or blinks to quickly reposition himself. This makes him vulnerable to champions who can close the gap and engage him in close combat. Additionally, Jhin's reliance on his fourth shot for maximum damage can sometimes lead to a delay in his damage output, giving opponents an opportunity to strike back.

In the world of League of Legends, Jhin's presence is felt not only through his gameplay but also through his captivating character design and skins. The

skin is a testament to the creativity and attention to detail that Riot Games puts into their champion designs. With its western theme and unique visual and sound effects, this skin truly brings Jhin to life as a gunslinger from the wild west.

If you want to explore more about Jhin and his various appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on our page dedicated to Jhin. Discover the artistry and precision of the Virtuoso and immerse yourself in the world of League of Legends.

Jhin (Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: January 8, 2021

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous planning and artistic approach to killing, Jhin has captivated players with his unique playstyle and dark aesthetic. One of his most striking skins is the

which was released on January 8, 2021, and can be purchased for 1350 RP.

The Story of Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin

The Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin skin draws inspiration from ancient Chinese mythology and art. The Shan Hai Scrolls, also known as the Classic of Mountains and Seas, is a collection of mythical tales and creatures. This skin transforms Jhin into a mythical warrior, adorned with intricate armor and wielding a mystical bow. The design incorporates elements of traditional Chinese culture, such as the vibrant colors and ornate patterns seen in Chinese paintings and tapestries.

The Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin skin showcases Jhin's obsession with perfection and beauty in a new light. The skin's splash art depicts Jhin standing atop a mountain peak, overlooking a mystical landscape. His armor is adorned with intricate details, and his bow is transformed into a majestic weapon, reflecting the power and elegance of ancient Chinese warriors.

In-game, the Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin skin brings the mythical theme to life. Jhin's abilities are visually enhanced, with vibrant colors and mystical effects. His auto-attacks are accompanied by ethereal trails, and his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, unleashes a barrage of enchanted arrows. The skin also features unique recall animations, where Jhin performs a graceful dance, paying homage to traditional Chinese dance forms.

Jhin's Story and Gameplay

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion with a dark and mysterious past. Born as Khada Jhin in Ionia, he was a gifted artist with a twisted obsession for perfection. However, his artistic talents took a sinister turn when he became a notorious serial killer, using his skills to create macabre masterpieces out of his victims.

In the game, Jhin is a marksman who excels at long-range damage and precision. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage every fourth shot, which critically strikes and deals additional damage based on a percentage of the target's missing health. This ability emphasizes Jhin's methodical approach to killing, as he carefully lines up his shots for maximum impact.

Jhin's other abilities include Dancing Grenade, a bouncing grenade that damages and slows enemies; Deadly Flourish, a skillshot that roots enemies in place; and Captive Audience, which places traps that explode when enemies step on them. His ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allows him to fire four powerful shots from his sniper rifle, dealing massive damage to enemies in a targeted area.

Jhin's gameplay revolves around careful positioning and timing. His long-range capabilities make him a threat from a distance, but he is vulnerable to close-range engagements. Jhin players must carefully plan their shots and take advantage of his abilities to maximize his damage output. His unique playstyle and high burst damage potential make him a favorite among players who enjoy strategic and calculated gameplay.

Jhin's story and gameplay have made him a popular champion in League of Legends. His dark and twisted persona, combined with his meticulous approach to killing, has captured the imagination of players. Whether you're a fan of his chilling aesthetic or enjoy the challenge of playing a high-risk, high-reward marksman, Jhin offers a unique and rewarding experience on the Summoner's Rift.

To learn more about Jhin and his various appearances, including the Shan Hai Scrolls Jhin skin, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch videos on platforms like YouTube. Immerse yourself in the world of Jhin and discover the artistry and precision of the Virtuoso.

Jhin (Dark Cosmic Jhin)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: January 9, 2020

Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his meticulous and artistic approach to combat, Jhin has captivated players with his unique playstyle and dark aesthetic. One of his most striking skins is the

which was released on January 9, 2020, and can be purchased for 1820 RP.

The Dark Cosmic Jhin skin takes the champion's already eerie persona to a whole new level. With its cosmic theme, this skin transforms Jhin into a celestial being consumed by darkness. The skin features a black and purple color scheme, with intricate cosmic patterns adorning his outfit. Jhin's mask is now a hauntingly beautiful galaxy, and his weapon, Whisper, has been redesigned to resemble a cosmic artifact, pulsating with dark energy.

The animations and effects of Dark Cosmic Jhin are truly mesmerizing. His abilities are enhanced with cosmic energy, creating stunning visual displays. When Jhin uses his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, the sky darkens, and cosmic energy swirls around him as he takes aim at his targets. The sound effects are also modified to match the cosmic theme, adding an extra layer of immersion to the skin.

In addition to the visual and audio enhancements, Dark Cosmic Jhin also comes with unique recall animations and voice lines. When recalling, Jhin is enveloped in a cosmic vortex, disappearing into the void before reappearing in a burst of dark energy. His voice lines are altered to reflect his newfound cosmic power, further immersing players into the skin's theme.

Now, let's delve into the story of Jhin and his place in the League of Legends universe. Jhin, originally named Khada Jhin, was once a renowned Ionian artist known for his exceptional skills in calligraphy and painting. However, his artistic talents took a dark turn when he became obsessed with perfection and the beauty of death. Jhin's mind twisted, and he began using his artistic abilities to create elaborate and gruesome murders, turning each killing into a macabre masterpiece.

Jhin's reign of terror caught the attention of the Ionian government, who sought to put an end to his gruesome acts. They enlisted the help of Shen, the Eye of Twilight, and Zed, the Master of Shadows, to capture Jhin. In a climactic battle, Jhin was defeated and imprisoned, but not before leaving a lasting impact on the world.

Years later, Jhin was freed by a mysterious benefactor who saw potential in his unique talents. Now, Jhin serves as an assassin for hire, using his artistic flair to carry out his missions with precision and style. His obsession with perfection and the beauty of death remains, making him a formidable and terrifying opponent on the battlefield.

In the game, Jhin is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His playstyle revolves around careful positioning and timing, as he relies on his abilities to set up devastating attacks. Jhin's passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage on every fourth shot, making each shot feel impactful and deadly. His ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allows him to fire four powerful shots from his sniper rifle, dealing massive damage to enemies caught in its path.

Jhin's strengths lie in his ability to burst down squishy targets and control team fights from a safe distance. His long-range capabilities and crowd control make him a valuable asset in team compositions, especially when paired with champions who can set up kills for him. However, Jhin's weaknesses lie in his immobility and vulnerability to assassins and divers. Without proper positioning and protection from his team, Jhin can easily be taken down by champions who can close the gap quickly.

Jhin: The Virtuoso

Jhin, also known as

is a champion in League of Legends who is known for his meticulous and artistic approach to killing. He is a marksman who excels at long-range combat and relies on his precision and timing to eliminate his targets.

Jhin's past in the game is shrouded in mystery, but it is known that he was once a renowned Ionian artist who became obsessed with perfection. His obsession led him down a dark path, and he eventually turned to murder as a means of expressing his art. Jhin's killings were not random acts of violence; they were carefully planned and executed with the precision of a master artist.

In the game, Jhin's abilities reflect his meticulous nature and his desire for perfection. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal bonus damage every fourth shot, with the fourth shot being a guaranteed critical strike. This ability encourages players to carefully time their shots and make each one count.

Jhin's Q ability, Dancing Grenade, allows him to throw a bouncing grenade that deals damage to enemies in its path. The grenade can bounce off of minions or other enemies, making it a versatile tool for harassing opponents and clearing waves of minions.

His W ability, Deadly Flourish, is a skillshot that roots the first enemy hit and reveals them to Jhin. This ability can be used to set up kills or to escape from dangerous situations, as it provides Jhin with valuable crowd control and vision.

Jhin's E ability, Captive Audience, places a trap on the ground that slows and damages enemies who walk over it. This ability can be used to control the battlefield and create zones of danger for the enemy team, making it an essential tool for Jhin players.

Finally, Jhin's ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allows him to channel and fire four shots in quick succession from his sniper rifle. Each shot deals massive damage to the target and slows them, making it a devastating tool for picking off key targets in team fights.

Jhin's strengths lie in his long-range damage and his ability to pick off targets from a safe distance. His passive ability, Whisper, allows him to deal massive damage with his fourth shot, making him a threat to squishy targets and tanks alike. His ultimate ability, Curtain Call, can turn the tide of team fights and secure kills from across the map.

However, Jhin also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is immobile and vulnerable to crowd control, making him an easy target for assassins and champions with high mobility. Jhin's reliance on his fourth shot for maximum damage also means that he has a slower attack speed compared to other marksmen, making him less effective in sustained fights.

In the League of Legends community, Jhin is often praised for his unique playstyle and his visually stunning abilities. His meticulous nature and artistic approach to killing make him a captivating and intriguing champion to play. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his gameplay, or his stunning visual design, Jhin is a champion that stands out in the world of League of Legends.

Jhin's Story and Role in the Game

Jhin's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as his gameplay. Born as Khada Jhin in Ionia, he was a child prodigy in the art of killing. His exceptional talent for marksmanship caught the attention of a secretive Ionian sect known as the Temple of the Nine Shadows. Under their guidance, Jhin honed his skills and became an assassin of unparalleled precision and brutality.

However, Jhin's thirst for perfection and his obsession with his craft led him down a dark path. He became fixated on creating the perfect murder, turning each kill into a macabre work of art. His victims were not chosen at random; they were carefully selected to send a message and evoke fear in the hearts of those who witnessed his handiwork.

Jhin's reign of terror eventually caught the attention of the authorities, and he was captured and imprisoned. But even behind bars, Jhin's influence continued to spread. He became a symbol of fear and fascination, with his name whispered in hushed tones by those who feared his return.

In the game, Jhin is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His unique mechanic, Whisper's Curtain Call, allows him to fire four powerful shots at long range, each dealing massive damage to his targets. Jhin's playstyle revolves around careful positioning and timing, as he relies on his abilities to set up devastating combos and eliminate his enemies with surgical precision.

Jhin's strengths lie in his ability to burst down squishy targets and control team fights with his long-range damage. His passive ability, Whisper's Whisper, grants him bonus damage on every fourth attack, making each shot feel impactful and rewarding. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Curtain Call, allows him to pick off enemies from afar or provide valuable crowd control in team fights.

However, Jhin also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He lacks mobility and is vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Jhin's reliance on positioning and careful setup means that he can struggle against champions who can quickly close the gap and engage on him. Additionally, his reload mechanic can leave him vulnerable during fights if not managed properly.

Despite his weaknesses, Jhin's unique playstyle and captivating design have made him a popular pick among players. His meticulous approach to combat and his dark and mysterious persona make him a compelling and intriguing champion to master.
